post.title: motorola droid x firmware update (.604) and hardware tracking thread
post.content: use this thread to post the software version and date code of your droid x. the x should come with firmware 1.13.516 but there is an over-the-air-update that (should) update it to .604 firmware. if it doesn't update you might want to try a factory reset, then have it check for the update you guys can post the date code on the back label if it differs from 25/10 (week/year).
